tagalog: Sana balang araw maabot natin ang ating mga pangarap.
english: I hope we reach our dreams someday.

tagalog: Malayo pa, pero malayo na narating mo.
english: It's still far, but you're already far from where you came from.

tagalog: Kailangan mo lang maniwala na magagawa mo.
english: You only need to believe you can do it.

tagalog: Kaya? Kakayanin.
english: Can it be done? It will be done.

tagalog: Sa araw-araw na pagmulat.
english: In everyday I open my eyes.

tagalog: Mula sa kaibigan, hanggang sa magka-ibigan.
english: From friends to lovers.

tagalog: Sayo lang at wala nang iba pa.
english: Only yours, and no else.

tagalog: Mula sa ating pangarap papunta na magkatotoo.
english: From our dreams until it becomes reality.

tagalog: Darating din ang araw na iyon.
english: That day will come.

tagalog: Hindi mahalaga ang kanilang sinasabi, ikaw lang.
english: What they say doesn't matter, only you that matters.

tagalog: Sa mundong maingay, boses mo lang ang aking naririnig.
english: In a world full of noise, I only hear your voice.

tagalog: Sana may kwenta ang mga sakripisyo.
english: Hoping that the sacrifices are worth it.

tagalog: Malapit na sana, kelan kaya mapapagbigyan?
english: It's almost there, when would it happen?

tagalog: Daig ng maaga ang masipag.
english: The early beats the hardworking.

tagalog: Sinoman ay makakapagmungkahi, nguni't hindi lahat makakatulong.
english: Anyone can suggest, but not everyone can help.

tagalog: Alisin ang mga bagay na balakid.
english: Get rid of the hindrances.

tagalog: Malapit na ang bagong panimula.
english: The new beginning is almost there.

tagalog: Padami ng padami ang mga pagsubok.
english: The challenges are now increasing.

tagalog: Kung marunong lang sanang makinig.
english: If only you knew how to listen.

tagalog: Pagod nang masisi sa mga bagay na hindi ko naman kontrolado.
english: Tired of being blamed by the things that are out of my control.

tagalog: Walang ibang makakatulong sayo kung hindi ang sarili mo lamang.
english: Only you can help yourself and nobody else.
